name: Stickman Ski - Winter Sports
description:
Since the early days of the Snow Mountain, Stickmans and Yetis all love skiing...
But in this new competition, there can only be one SKIING KING of the land, could it be you? Try this zen-like Skiing game NOW
...
* Play by one finger
* Tap to change direction
* Pass pine trees to get golds
* Use gold to unlock new Skiers
* Duplicated Skiers give you more Hearts

Enjoy the Cold!!! But don't let Yetis catch you...

- Font: "Kenney.nl"
- Music by:



From Thantoan with love,
